name: mass_concentration_of_chlorophyllide_a_in_sea_water
description: "Mass concentration" means mass per unit volume and is used in the construction "mass_concentration_of_X_in_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical species or biological group denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox_expressed_as_nitrogen". The chemical formula of chlorophyllide-a is C35H34MgN4O5.
